cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on July 28, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6265, Countering Assad’s Proliferation Trafficking and Garnering of Narcotics Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 215 (Tuesday, December 14, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. HILL:
H.R. 6265.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H7824]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: CAPTAGON Act
